meanings.definition: Incorrect or improper use of resources or personnel
meanings.sent1: The misemployments of company funds led to financial losses.
meanings.sent2: She discovered several misemployments of office supplies in the department.
meanings.sent3: The misemployments of the stapler as a hammer caused it to break.
meanings.sent4: His misemployments of time turned his schedule into chaos.
meanings.sent5: The misemployments of the new software confused the entire team.

meanings.definition: Instances of using something or someone in a way that is not suitable or effective
meanings.sent1: The misemployments of the ladder as a shelf made it unstable.
meanings.sent2: They discussed the misemployments of the old technology in the project.
meanings.sent3: Her misemployments of the umbrella as a walking stick amused her friends.
meanings.sent4: The misemployments of words in the speech created confusion among the audience.
meanings.sent5: The misemployments of the paintbrush on the wall left streaks everywhere.
